data.Name: yung van, yung kell, NeverxHappy, THURSTON
data.Description: Lexington, Kentuckys very own yung van has made an indisputable mark pioneering the new era of alternative music. Everything from early Emo Rap offerings like his breakout track I Waited on You, You Never Came taking SoundCloud by storm - all the way to inspiring the next generation of rising artists. He managed to do all of this, while continuing to evolve his own sound, becoming an extremely versatile multi-genre vocalist in the process. van would also go on to found Minivan Records, a small independent label focused on underground talent. Through Minivan Records he puts on amazing live shows with the likes of Demxntia, czyby, and kaiyko. 2020 saw the underground legend release his single Translucent in collaboration with fellow artist Demxntia, a track that would go on to amass hundreds of thousands of streams across all platforms. Hed also release other tracks including Sunshine Hotel featuring Spaceman Zack, as well as solo offerings like I fucking died the day I watched you go. A song written about the tragic loss of Vans best friend, Jonathan Meristil, to a shooting on Christmas Eve.

data.Name: The Black Buzzard at Oskar Blues
